title: Unspecified error occured. Please check the logs for more information.
body: that message popped up to my friend while updateing his client. Can someone help asap? ty

replies.body: It sounds like your friend is still on the legacy client.  I can help but need more info, specifically at what % he's getting the error.  He can also hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help him directly!
